field.name: zopim_id
field.label: Zopim id
field.description: This is the Zopim id provided by Zopim in the widget code (located directly after the question mark).

field.name: language_id
field.label: Language code
field.description: This is typically a two charactor ISO code.

field.name: zopim_show
field.label: Zopim Show Position
field.description: You can enter a module position here. The Zopim live chat will be shown on pages where a module is assigned to this position.

field.name: zopim_hide
field.label: Zopim Hide Position
field.description: You can enter a module position here. The Zopim chat bubble will be hidden on pages where a module is assigned to this position.

field.name: zopim_version
field.label: Widget version
field.description: Zopim released an exciting new Chat Widget v2. You just need to select v2 to activate the new widget.

field.name: zopim_tablet
field.label: Hide for Tablet
field.description: If set to Yes, the chat bubble will be hidden on Tablets.

field.name: zopim_mobile
field.label: Hide for Mobile
field.description: If set to Yes, the chat bubble will be hidden on Mobiles.
